name: XRReferenceSpaceEventInit.referenceSpace
description: The XRReferenceSpaceEventInit property referenceSpace is used to establish the value of a newly-constructed XRReferenceSpaceEvent object when calling the XRReferenceSpaceEvent() constructor.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The XRReferenceSpaceEventInit property referenceSpace is used to establish the value of a newly-constructed XRReferenceSpaceEvent object when calling the XRReferenceSpaceEvent() constructor.
